#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
	int N;
	int m = 1;
	while (cin>>N && N)
	{
		int arr[N];
		int sum = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
		{
			cin>>arr[i];
			sum += arr[i];
		}
		sum /= N;
		int dev = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
		{
			dev += abs(sum - arr[i]);
		}
		cout<<"Set #"<<m++<<"\nThe minimum number of moves is "<<dev/2<<".\n\n";
	}
}
